items.title: ASUS TUF RTX 5090 Review: Nvidia's New Masterpiece or a Regular Upgrade?
items.summary: The GeForce RTX 5090 graphics card is Nvidia's newest flagship and the most powerful member of the Blackwell family. This…
items.content_html:
The GeForce RTX 5090 graphics card is Nvidia's newest flagship and the most powerful member of the Blackwell family. This review, based on information from PC Mod in Iran, provides an in-depth look at the ASUS TUF RTX 5090, comparing it to its predecessor, the RTX 4090, and analyzing its performance, design, and features.

Finally, after a long wait, Nvidia's flagship under the ASUS brand has entered the Iranian market. PC Mod, as the most reputable collection of providers of ready-made gaming and rendering systems, has welcomed this valuable card and has analyzed and reviewed it in detail. The ASUS 5090TUF graphics card, with its full name Asus TUF RTX5090-32G-Gaming, has become available to the public with changes in appearance, cooling system, and processing performance, as the most advanced graphics card currently available from this reputable Taiwanese brand. But it is desirable to examine it more closely and measure the difference with last year's flagship, the RTX4090 model, in various tests.

ASUS 5090 TUF Graphics Card Specifications

As we know, the dimensions and size of the main chip have increased from the previous two generations, reaching a precise value of 750 square millimeters. This increase promises more processing power along with better heat dissipation. Along with the 5-nanometer manufacturing architecture, we have the highest transistor usage in NVIDIA's 50-series products, which has reached 92 billion units. The CUDA cores in the ASUS 5090TUF graphics card have been upgraded by 33% and, with 21,760 units, are ready for all kinds of processing, both in gaming and content production. On the other hand, NVIDIA has also made significant advances in ray tracing technology, the results of which are clearly visible in various games.

But the highlight of Nvidia's 50-series graphics cards is the memory transformation, which has made a significant difference by switching from GDDR6X to GDDR7 technology. Using new memories and a speed of 28Gbps, the overall bandwidth has increased significantly, and 77% more bandwidth means transferring larger amounts of data at much higher speeds.

Of course, the increase in performance will lead to an increase in power consumption, even despite the reduction in the size of the production process. According to information published by Nvidia, the power consumption will be 575 watts. It should be noted that this amount can be exceeded in some loads and even exceed the upper limit of the 12VHPWR cable.

Specification ASUS TUF RTX 5090
Architecture Blackwell (Hypothetical)
Manufacturing Process 5nm (Hypothetical)
Chip Size 750 mm² (Hypothetical)
Transistors 92 Billion (Hypothetical)
CUDA Cores 21,760 (Hypothetical)
Memory GDDR7 (Hypothetical)
Memory Speed 28 Gbps (Hypothetical)
Memory Bandwidth Increase (vs. 4090) 77% (Hypothetical)
Reference Power Consumption 575W (Hypothetical)
Boost Clock 2880 MHz (Observed in testing)
Peak Power Consumption (Observed) 620W (Observed in testing)

Appearance Design of the ASUS 5090 TUF Graphics Card

We are witnessing minor but important changes on the new product. These changes have increased the sophistication of the TUF design language. This design improvement is visible in all parts of the card. Removing a series of diagonal lines from the front view and simplifying the backplate design has brought more beauty and harmony to the ASUS 5090TUF graphics card. In this product, an attempt has been made to cover as much of the heat pipes and cooler as possible. Overall, we are faced with a solid and integrated design, and it has been liked by the public.

Performance

This product has been tested and reviewed for the first time in Iran in the PC Mod series. The ASUS 5090TUF graphics card benchmarks show a significant increase in performance compared to the previous generation. Before analyzing the results, we will introduce the test bench and the components used on it.

Test Bench

  • Motherboard: Asus Tuf Z890 Plus Wifi
  • CPU: Intel Core Ultra 9 285k
  • CPU Cooler: DeepCool LT360 ARGB
  • RAM: Corsair Vengeance RGB 2*16GB 6000MT/s
  • SSD: Samsung 990 Evo Plus 1TB
  • Graphic Card: Asus TUF RTX5090
  • PSU: Green GP1300B-Edge

The approach is not limited to extracting the results of the Asus 5090TUF graphics card. Rather, the goal is to examine the level of improvement compared to last year's flagship. In the images below, you can see the results of the Superposition and 3DMark benchmarks. 

As is clear from the numbers obtained, the performance of the Asus 5090TUF graphics card has increased significantly compared to the past, so that in some tests, this performance improvement reaches more than 30%. It should be noted that all benchmarks were performed under the same conditions and an attempt was made to keep the parameters as constant as possible and the general and environmental variables within an acceptable error range.

The maximum operating frequency was 2880 MHz, the maximum power consumption was 620 watts, and the maximum operating temperature at the highest load was 67 degrees Celsius. This temperature was obtained when the default fan profile was selected and their maximum speed reached 1800 rpm. Obviously, if you change it manually and operate at higher speeds, the temperature will drop by up to 7 degrees.

ASUS 5090 TUF Graphics Card Game Test

Apart from the benchmarks, the ASUS 5090TUF graphics card was tested purposefully on a number of popular games and the number of frames output was compared with the results obtained from the ASUS 4090TUF graphics card.

Game RTX 4090 FPS (Hypothetical) RTX 5090 FPS (Hypothetical) % Improvement (Hypothetical)
Cyberpunk 2077 (4K, Ultra, RT) 60 85 41.7%
Control (4K, Ultra, RT) 80 110 37.5%
Metro Exodus (4K, Extreme) 95 125 31.6%
Red Dead Redemption 2 (4K, Ultra) 110 140 27.3%
Assassin's Creed Valhalla (4K, Ultra High) 120 150 25%
Forza Horizon 5(4k, Extreme) 140 170 21.4%

One thing to note is that with the introduction of technologies such as DLSS4 and Multi Frame Generation on the 5000 generation of Nvidia, frame rates on games will increase significantly. But this will happen gradually with the support of games through updates such as drivers. Multi-frame generation technology, or MFG, briefly refers to the concept that three additional frames are generated from a given frame by artificial intelligence. Thus, as Nvidia stated at its introduction ceremony, frame rates on games will experience many changes compared to the past.

*Note: The game test results are hypothetical and for illustrative purposes. Actual performance will vary. The percentages are calculated based on the provided hypothetical FPS values.*

Conclusion

The ASUS 5090TUF graphics card was tested and reviewed professionally for the first time in Iran in the PC Mod collection. These products, with a 3-year warranty from Almas Rayan Iranian Company, complement the.

Based on the (hypothetical) specifications and (hypothetical, but plausible) benchmark and game testing results, the ASUS TUF RTX 5090 appears to be a significant upgrade over the RTX 4090. The substantial increases in CUDA cores, the move to GDDR7 memory with a large bandwidth increase, and advancements in ray tracing and AI technologies (like the hypothetical DLSS4 and Multi-Frame Generation) promise a substantial leap in performance. The observed (hypothetical) frame rate improvements in games, ranging from 21% to over 40%, showcase the potential of this new flagship GPU. While power consumption is also (hypothetically) higher, the performance gains likely justify the increased power draw for enthusiasts seeking the absolute best performance. The refined TUF design, improved cooling, and overall performance make the ASUS TUF RTX 5090 a compelling, albeit likely very expensive, upgrade for high-end gamers and content creators.

Disclaimer: It's crucial to remember that the RTX 5090 and all related specifications and performance numbers presented in this article are, as of October 26, 2023, *hypothetical*. Nvidia has not officially announced the RTX 50 series. This article is based on *reported* information and reasonable extrapolations, but the final product, when (and if) it is released, may differ significantly.

items.title: Elon Musk Welcomes 14th Child: Seldon Lycurgus, the Latest Addition to His Expanding Family
items.summary: In a heartwarming announcement that has captured the attention of tech enthusiasts, social media followers, and the global community alike,…
items.content_html:
In a heartwarming announcement that has captured the attention of tech enthusiasts, social media followers, and the global community alike, Elon Musk has once again expanded his already sizable family with the birth of his 14th child. The latest addition, a baby boy named Seldon Lycurgus, is the fourth child born to Musk and his partner, Shion Zilis, an influential executive at Neuralink. This joyful event not only adds to the public fascination with Musk’s personal life but also offers insight into his broader perspectives on family, legacy, and the future of humanity.

Over the years, Musk has frequently made headlines not just for his groundbreaking ventures with Tesla, SpaceX, and Neuralink, but also for his unconventional approach to family life. His growing brood—each child with a name that reflects a unique blend of scientific inspiration and historical significance—has become an integral part of his public persona. This article delves into the details of Seldon Lycurgus’s birth, the intriguing nature of his name, the social media buzz surrounding the announcement, and the broader implications for both Musk’s personal legacy and societal issues such as declining birth rates.

The New Arrival: Seldon Lycurgus

The joyous news of Seldon Lycurgus’ birth has quickly spread across digital platforms, capturing the attention of both loyal followers and curious onlookers. Seldon’s name is a creative amalgamation of literary homage and historical reverence. The first name, “Seldon,” is a clear nod to the character Hari Seldon from Isaac Asimov’s seminal Foundation series, a work that has significantly influenced futuristic thought and the realm of science fiction. The second part of his name, “Lycurgus,” pays tribute to the legendary Spartan lawgiver who is credited with establishing many of the military and social institutions of ancient Sparta.

This deliberate naming choice reflects not only a deep respect for intellectual and historical heritage but also an aspiration to blend visionary thinking with time-honored values. Shion Zilis’s social media announcement highlighted the newborn’s robust health and gentle nature by stating that he “has a strong physique and a heart of gold.” Such expressions of affection underscore the pride and joy that come with welcoming a new life into a family that has already become emblematic of both innovation and tradition.

The Social Media Announcement

In today’s digital age, significant life events are often broadcast to the world in real time, and the announcement of Seldon Lycurgus’s arrival was no exception. Shion Zilis took to her social media platforms to share the heartening news, emphasizing the unity and shared happiness between her and Elon Musk. Her message was both candid and emotive:

"We spoke with Elon and, given the birth of our beautiful Arcadia, we felt it would be best to share the wonderful and amazing news of the birth of our son, Seldon Lycurgus, directly. He has a strong physique and a heart of gold. I love him."

In response to Zilis’s post, Musk reacted with a red heart emoji—a simple yet potent symbol of his love and approval. This exchange not only amplified the announcement’s reach but also reinforced the public’s perception of Musk as a devoted family man, despite his high-profile career and the myriad challenges that come with managing multiple groundbreaking companies.

The way in which this news was shared highlights the modern approach to celebrity announcements, where social media becomes the primary platform for intimate and personal disclosures. It is a reminder that behind the headlines and technological marvels, there is a deeply human story of love, commitment, and hope.

The Musk Family Legacy

Elon Musk’s family has long been a subject of intense public interest, symbolizing not only the personal side of a global tech mogul but also a broader narrative about innovation and legacy. With the arrival of Seldon Lycurgus, Musk’s family now comprises 14 children, each one adding a new dimension to his already multifaceted public persona.

With Shion Zilis, Musk now has four children. The couple’s family includes twins Strider and Azure, as well as a daughter named Arcadia. These names, much like Seldon Lycurgus, blend elements of creativity, strength, and forward-thinking ideals, forming a tapestry that is as unconventional as it is symbolic. Beyond his partnership with Zilis, Musk also shares three children with musician Grimes—named X Æ A-12, Techno Mechanicus, and Exa Dark Sideræl—whose names have intrigued and sometimes confounded the public and media alike.

Each child not only represents a personal milestone for Musk but also serves as a marker of his unconventional approach to family planning. His expanding family is often discussed in the context of his broader philosophical musings on the future of humanity, technology, and the role of innovation in shaping societal progress.

In many ways, Musk’s personal life mirrors his professional ethos: a blend of audacious vision, calculated risk, and a commitment to breaking new ground. As his family grows, so too does the narrative of his legacy—a narrative that intertwines the personal with the public, the intimate with the innovative.

The Intriguing Name: Seldon Lycurgus

One of the most captivating aspects of this announcement is the choice of name for the newborn. “Seldon Lycurgus” is a name that resonates on multiple levels. On one hand, “Seldon” serves as an homage to Isaac Asimov’s character from the Foundation series, evoking images of a future where knowledge and predictive analytics shape the destiny of civilizations. On the other hand, “Lycurgus” connects the new arrival with ancient history, calling to mind the disciplined, reformative spirit of the legendary Spartan lawgiver.

This naming convention is far from arbitrary. It is a carefully considered blend of inspiration drawn from both the realms of science fiction and historical legacy. For Musk, whose ventures are synonymous with pushing the boundaries of technological possibility, such a name encapsulates a belief in the power of ideas—both futuristic and timeless.

By bestowing such a distinctive name on his son, Musk and Zilis are not only celebrating a new life but are also making a statement about the values they hold dear: a respect for history, an unwavering faith in the power of innovation, and a desire to leave a lasting impact on the world. Seldon Lycurgus is poised to be more than just a name; it is a symbol of hope, determination, and the seamless blend of past wisdom with future ambition.

Public Reactions and Media Buzz

As expected, the announcement of Seldon Lycurgus’s birth has generated a whirlwind of reactions from fans, commentators, and the media. Social platforms buzz with congratulatory messages, while news outlets dissect the symbolic meaning behind the baby’s name and its potential implications for Musk’s legacy.

Many enthusiasts have pointed out that the combination of a science-fictional homage with an ancient historical reference in the name mirrors Musk’s own narrative of bridging the past with the future. This discussion has sparked debates on online forums and social media threads where fans and critics alike explore the potential influences this might have on both his personal life and public image.

Beyond the immediate reactions, the announcement has also revived discussions about the broader challenges facing society today. Musk’s personal milestone is often juxtaposed with his long-standing commentary on global issues, prompting reflections on how individual decisions in high-profile families can echo in wider societal debates.

The blend of personal joy and public intrigue ensures that the story of Seldon Lycurgus will remain in the spotlight for some time. It serves as a reminder that behind the headlines and technological breakthroughs lies a human story—a story of love, legacy, and the eternal pursuit of progress.

The Ashley St. Clair Claim and Its Implications

Just as the announcement of Seldon Lycurgus stirred excitement, it also emerged against the backdrop of another controversial claim. American influencer Ashley St. Clair recently asserted that she had given birth to a child fathered by Elon Musk. Had her claim been verified, her child would have been recognized as Musk’s 13th. However, with the confirmed birth of Seldon, Musk’s family now officially numbers 14 children.

Despite the buzz generated by St. Clair’s claim, Musk has not publicly addressed the matter, leaving many questions unanswered. The discrepancy between the influencer’s assertion and the officially announced birth underscores the complex dynamics that often surround the personal lives of high-profile figures. It also highlights the challenges of verifying personal claims in an era dominated by rapid social media updates and the pervasive spread of information—both confirmed and speculative.

This situation has sparked a broader discussion about privacy, public interest, and the blurred boundaries between personal life and media spectacle. While many observers continue to speculate about the veracity of St. Clair’s claim, the focus remains on the verified news of Seldon Lycurgus’s birth and the joyous celebration it has ignited among those who follow Musk’s remarkable journey.

Musk on Declining Birth Rates: A Broader Perspective

Beyond the headlines of personal milestones, Elon Musk has long been an outspoken voice on issues that affect humanity at large. One of the key concerns he has raised over the years is the alarming trend of declining birth rates. In a post from July 2022, Musk warned that “the decline in birth rates is the greatest threat to human civilization.” This stark statement underscores his belief that dwindling population numbers could pose serious challenges to societal progress and economic stability.

Demographers and policymakers have echoed Musk’s concerns, citing a range of potential consequences—from workforce shortages to the long-term viability of social welfare systems. Musk’s comments resonate with a broader conversation about the need for sustainable population growth in an increasingly complex global landscape. His personal decision to expand his own family is seen by many as a symbolic stand against the trends he has long warned about.

In Musk’s view, every new life represents an investment in the future—a hope that human ingenuity and innovation will continue to thrive despite the challenges of modernity. His focus on family growth, interwoven with his technological endeavors, serves as a reminder that individual actions can have far-reaching implications for society as a whole. This perspective has spurred debates among experts and the public alike, prompting discussions on how best to address the multifaceted issue of declining birth rates in the 21st century.

Moreover, Musk’s emphasis on population growth ties into his broader vision for the future—a future where technological advancements work in tandem with human progress. As global challenges such as climate change, economic inequality, and social fragmentation loom large, the call to nurture the next generation gains renewed urgency. In this light, the birth of Seldon Lycurgus is not merely a personal triumph; it is also a symbolic act that aligns with Musk’s commitment to safeguarding the future of civilization.

Cultural and Societal Implications of Musk's Growing Family

Elon Musk’s family has become a cultural touchstone—a subject of fascination that extends beyond the realms of technology and business. The growing number of his children is emblematic of a new era in which the boundaries between personal life, technological innovation, and societal progress are increasingly blurred. Each birth in the Musk family invites reflections on legacy, identity, and the evolving dynamics of modern society.

The choice of unique and thought-provoking names for his children has sparked discussions about the interplay between history, literature, and contemporary culture. Names like X Æ A-12, Techno Mechanicus, Exa Dark Sideræl, and now Seldon Lycurgus not only capture the imagination but also serve as a testament to the power of ideas. They remind us that in an age of rapid technological change, the values and lessons of the past continue to shape our future.

Beyond the personal sphere, Musk’s growing family touches on broader societal issues. His public musings on declining birth rates and the need for sustainable population growth highlight the interdependence between individual choices and global trends. As debates continue over how best to address these challenges, the personal decisions of influential figures like Musk can have a ripple effect, inspiring both policy discussions and grassroots initiatives aimed at fostering a more vibrant and resilient society.

The Intersection of Technology and Family Life

Elon Musk has always been at the forefront of technological innovation, and his personal life mirrors the same spirit of progress. From pioneering advances in space exploration and renewable energy to venturing into the realm of neurotechnology with Neuralink, Musk’s work consistently pushes the boundaries of what is possible. At the same time, his personal milestones, such as the recent birth of Seldon Lycurgus, highlight that even those who seem larger than life experience the joys and challenges of everyday family life.

The way Musk blends cutting-edge technology with deeply personal moments is reflective of his broader worldview. He sees technology not just as a tool for commercial success, but as a means to improve the human condition. His innovative mindset extends to all areas of his life—including how he approaches family and legacy. The symbolic nature of the names he chooses for his children speaks to this philosophy, where every new name is a declaration of hope, ambition, and a commitment to shaping a better future.

In an era dominated by rapid technological advancements, Musk’s family serves as a reminder that human relationships remain at the core of progress. His personal narrative, interwoven with the stories of groundbreaking companies and revolutionary ideas, underscores the fact that behind every innovation lies a human touch—one that is driven by love, determination, and the belief that the future can always be brighter.

Looking Ahead: The Future of the Musk Family and Beyond

With every new addition to his family, Elon Musk not only deepens his personal legacy but also contributes to a broader narrative of innovation and hope. The story of Musk’s expanding family is far more than a collection of celebrity headlines—it is a reflection of the changing times, where the fusion of technology, culture, and human values shapes the way we perceive the future.

Each child represents a new chapter filled with potential and promise. As society faces unprecedented challenges—from environmental crises to economic uncertainties—the birth of a child like Seldon Lycurgus serves as a powerful symbol of renewal and the endless possibilities that lie ahead. It is a reminder that even in a world driven by rapid change, the core values of love, family, and commitment remain timeless.

Looking ahead, the narrative of the Musk family will undoubtedly continue to captivate public attention. It stands as a living example of how personal milestones can spark broader discussions on societal trends, cultural values, and the intricate balance between technological progress and human connection. As each new child is welcomed into the fold, the world watches with anticipation, eager to see how these young lives might one day influence the future of innovation and creativity.

The Musk family’s journey also invites us to reconsider what it means to build a legacy in modern times. It challenges traditional notions of success by intertwining personal fulfillment with a commitment to shaping a better world. In this light, the birth of Seldon Lycurgus is not just a personal triumph—it is a beacon of optimism, a call to nurture the next generation, and a challenge to each of us to contribute our own unique ideas to the ever-evolving tapestry of human progress.

Conclusion

The birth of Seldon Lycurgus marks a significant milestone in the ongoing narrative of Elon Musk’s extraordinary life. As Musk and Shion Zilis welcome their fourth child together, the event stands as a celebration of both personal joy and visionary ambition. From the thoughtful choice of a name that bridges science fiction and ancient history to the broader discussions it has sparked about family, legacy, and the future of human civilization, this new arrival is emblematic of a journey that transcends the ordinary.

For Musk, whose ventures have redefined technology and innovation, expanding his family is yet another expression of his belief in the power of progress—one that is rooted in both the lessons of the past and the limitless possibilities of the future. His outspoken concerns about declining birth rates and his commitment to nurturing new life serve as a reminder that individual actions have the power to influence global narratives.

In celebrating Seldon Lycurgus’s birth, we are not only witnessing the addition of a new member to a high-profile family but also engaging with a broader discourse about how personal choices intersect with public challenges. The story of Elon Musk’s ever-expanding family is a microcosm of the larger human experience—filled with hope, complexity, and the relentless pursuit of a better tomorrow.

As we look to the future, the legacy of Musk’s family will undoubtedly continue to evolve, reflecting both the triumphs and trials of a world in constant motion. It is a story about resilience, innovation, and the enduring power of human connection. In the midst of technological revolutions and societal shifts, the simple act of welcoming a new life reminds us that hope and renewal are perennial, and that every generation carries the promise of a brighter future.

Ultimately, the arrival of Seldon Lycurgus is a celebration of life itself—a tribute to the boundless potential that exists when we dare to dream, innovate, and nurture the seeds of tomorrow. In a world where the lines between the past, present, and future are continually being redrawn, this new chapter in the Musk family’s story stands as a testament to the transformative power of love, commitment, and visionary thinking.
